definition: school/sect/purpose/model/ancestor/clan/to take as one's model (in academic or artistic work)/classifier for batches, items, cases (medical or legal), reservoirs

sentences.english: Still water and still religion freeze the quickest.
sentences.chinese: 一潭死水和死寂的宗教冰凍得最快。

sentences.english: There are two religion clauses in the First Amendment.
sentences.chinese: 《第一條修正案》裏有兩條關於宗教的條款。

sentences.english: Members of primitive society do not distinguish between medicine, magic and religion.
sentences.chinese: 原始社會的成員並沒有區別醫學，魔術與宗教。

sentences.english: They carried banners advocating religious freedom and sang “We Shall Overcome.”
sentences.chinese: 他們扛着橫幅主張宗教自由，還唱着“我們贏定了”。

sentences.english: The Hendersons seldom go to church, but they believe.
sentences.chinese: 亨德森一家很少去教堂做禮拜，但他們篤信宗教。

sentences.english: From time to time, some of my readers take a stab at converting me to their religion.
sentences.chinese: 我的一些讀者時常嘗試把我轉變成他們的宗教的信徒。

sentences.english: The New Age person often prefers a direct spiritual experience rather than one from organized religion.
sentences.chinese: 新時代人經常寧愛直接的靈性體驗勝過有組織的宗教。

sentences.english: During the construction of socialistic new villages, people always confuse religion with feudal superstition.
sentences.chinese: 在農村中，人們往往把宗教與封建迷信聯繫在一起。

sentences.english: Because Confucianism has intensively religious characteristic, so it is a very orbicular religion.
sentences.chinese: 因之具高度的宗教性，是極圓成的宗教。

sentences.english: Because Confucianism has intensively religious characteristic, so it is a very orbicular religion.
sentences.chinese: 因之具高度的宗教性，是極圓成的宗教。

sentences.english: Where has religion taken shelter after Krsna has retired to His own abode?
sentences.chinese: 當奎師那離開回到祂自己的居所後宗教到哪裏去託庇？

sentences.english: Perhaps that's why religious groups are particularly drawn to GTD.
sentences.chinese: 也許正因爲如此GTD尤其受到宗教團體的歡迎。

sentences.english: The Bahá'í Faith is currently the largest religious minority in Iran.
sentences.chinese: 巴哈伊教是目前伊朗最大的少數派宗教。

sentences.english: We can just say religion excess, why?
sentences.chinese: 我們可以就說這是宗教的膨脹，爲什麼呢？

sentences.english: Marius had preserved the religious habits of his childhood.
sentences.chinese: 馬呂斯一直保持着幼年時養成的那些宗教習氣。

sentences.english: Discuss the influence of religion on Western medical theories of sex.
sentences.chinese: 試論宗教對西方的性醫學理論的影響。

definition: religious belief/to practice a faith/to be religious
pantheism, theological theory equating God with the Universe
union of religious and political rule/theocracy/Caesaropapism
